title: Scaffolding-Based Nursing Patient Education Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing theory, clinical experience, and basic understanding of health education planning
context.additional_context: Development and implementation of personalized patient education scenarios reflecting learner roles, emphasizing collaborative learning through digital tools

learning_goals: Learners can design a chronic disease management education program utilizing scaffolding strategies (modeling, feedback, questioning techniques).
Learners can collaboratively develop patient education materials with team members using digital collaboration tools and validate them via a PBL approach.
Learners can analyze real community cases to create personalized patient education plans and measure their effectiveness.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
